resources.string: Loading menus. This could take some minutes.
The menus are cached on your phone - the next time you\'ll see them immediatelly ;)\n\n(If a restaurant is closed, this loading screen will be shown. I\'ll fix this as soon as possible)

MensaUPB is an Open Source application. The source code can be found on github. Feedback and bug reports can be sent via mail to lippertsjan@gmail.com.

The Studentenwerk Paderborn provides an API to access the menu data. More information on hier

The following Open Source libraries are used:

MensaUPB is a rewrite of David Maicher\'s and Tony Lemke\'s app "MensaUPB".
This app shows the menus for the Stuendenwerk\'s restaurants. In the original version, a "secret" XML was downloaded and cached. The Studentenwerk did not allow to distribute the original app. Luckily, the Studentenwerk\'s postition changed and now there\'s an API to access the menu data. Therefore the app had to be rewritten from the scratch -- and finally is available in the PlayStore again.
